title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, artificial pearls, silver and gold metallic thread on linen
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Virginia L. Hunt in memory of Mrs. Ridgley Hunt
description: A vertical panel with a design of scrolling bands and stems with flowers and leaves worked in shades of pink, blue, lavender, green and black with gold and silver thread and and pearls on a ground on couched gold. Trimmed with ball fringe.
